I hope to hear from others if this has been working for them or if they had to get creative in order to make it work...
"the files that remain resident and connect to internet". What files?

@JPeterson
Not this one, this has been cleaned off. The other file that you can find around in internet, of about 1.30 MB of size, when runned it creates some extra files that try to connect to internet. If you use the other, you can find a foreign CMD.EXE in %AppData%\Microsoft, and other System320.exe and System3215.exe in %WinDir%. Only the last is the good one.
